::Zardus::

Zardus nods, looking Bigfish over. New bots were always a good thing.

"Welcome to the Alliance, Bigfish," he says, walking around 
Bigfish, "I am Zardus, your commander. If DevilDuer would have gotten 
you here sooner, you could have been in time for a battle. The 
battle's still going on, but its mostly over now."





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Big fish" <Bigfish1011@h...> wrote:
> :::Bigfish:::
> ::Bigfish swims up to the spot where Devil Duer climbed out of the 
water. 
> Bigfish lunged forward and pulled himself out of the water. The air 
struck 
> his body. The coldness startled him but he got used to it really 
fast.  
> Bigfish looked up at Devil Duer and the bot next to him. He walked 
over to 
> the bot next to devil duer and bowed his head.::
> 
> "Hello, my name is Bigfish."
> 
> ::Bigfish stood up striaght and waited for a reaply::
